chinese: 材料资源被放置在图书馆参考台上。
english: Resources of materials are on hold on the library reference desk.

chinese: 今天早上的经济政策讲座已经取消。
english: This morning's lecture on economic policy has been canceled.

chinese: 这部器乐作品的主题展示了更多含蓄的创作风格。
english: The theme of the instrumental work exhibits more of a demure compositional style.

chinese: 学生们发现，判断真假题比短答案更难。
english: Students find that true or false questions are harder than short answers.
soundmark: /ˈstjuːdənts/ /faɪnd/ ðæt/ truː/ ɔːr/ fɔːls/ ˈkwɛstʃənz/ ɑːr/ ˈhɑːrdə/ ðæn/ ʃɔːrt/ ˈɑːnsərz/

chinese: 我们认为教育改革没有得到充分实施。
english: Our view is that educational reforms have been inadequately implemented.
soundmark: /aʊər/ /vjuː/ ɪz/ ðæt/ ˌɛdʒʊˈkeɪʃənl/ rɪˈfɔːrmz/ hæv/ bɪn/ ˌɪnəˈdækwətli/ ˈɪmplɪmɛntɪd/

chinese: 所有的论文都必须附有提交表格。
english: All dissertations must be accompanied with a submission form.
soundmark: /ɔːl/ dɪsərˈteɪʃənz/ mʌst/ bi/ əˈkʌmpənid/ wɪð/ ə/ səbˈmɪʃən/ fɔːrm/

chinese: 某些科学原理需要通过口头或逻辑推理学习。
english: Certain scientific principles need to be learned verbally or by logical deduction.
soundmark: /ˈsɜːtn/ ˌsaɪənˈtɪfɪk/ ˈprɪnsəpəlz/ niːd/ tuː/ bi/ lɜːrnd/ ˈvɜːrbəli/ ɔːr/ baɪ/ ˈlɒdʒɪkl/ dɪˈdʌkʃən/

chinese: 画廊主任对匿名捐赠表示感谢。
english: The director of gallery was grateful for the anonymous donation.
soundmark: /ðə/ dɪˈrɛktər/ ɒv/ ˈɡæləri/ wəz/ ˈɡreɪtfʊl/ fɔːr/ ðə/ əˈnɒnɪməs/ dəʊˈneɪʃən/

chinese: 这门课程的毕业生通常在金融领域追求职业。
english: Graduates from this course typically pursue careers in financial sector.

chinese: 成为医学专家需要多年的训练。
english: Years of training is required to become a medical specialist.
